attributes.action: Resurface and clean up Studley Green Bmx track.
attributes.additional_details: I want the council to do this because it will be a meeting place for people and it will also be a nice addition to the community of trowbridge because it could attract bmx clubs and many people to get out and ride their bikes.
attributes.background: The track needs to be resurfaced and needs to made wider so that it isnt as rough as it is now and it is dangerous because the landing have very sharp rocks in them.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. The request of your petition is something your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament, are responsible for.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
